name: 3D Turn Based RPG Demo
description:
Game audio demo that showcases a RPG like battle music for turn based or action rpg games.  This demo also features heavy usage of CineMachine for cameras, and TimeLine for character attacks/reactions and movements.

Finally, you can  play a full turn based rpg battle, that includes a boss fight in the last wave.

Game made by Raúl Ibarra Aranda, using assets from "Mixamo"
Music made by www.soundxp.net
